vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.6.20;
son of: Jahath (H3189H);
father of: Joah (H3098H)
§ Zimmah = "plotter"
1) a Gershonite Levite, son of Jahath
2) another Gershonite, son of Shimei; perhaps the same as 1 above
3) father or ancestor of Joah, a Gershonite in the reign of Hezekiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   hijo de Jáhat; descendiente de Guersón; tribu de Leví; (2b)   hijo de Simí; ancestro de Asaf; tribu de Leví; (2c)   padre de Joah, levita, en tiempos del rey Ezequías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
薪瑪 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "策劃者"
1) 革順人, 雅哈的兒子 (代上 6:20)
2) 革順人, 示每的兒子 (代上 6:42)
3) 希西家時代人物; 約亞的父親或先祖 (代下 29:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
薪玛 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "策划者"
1) 革顺人, 雅哈的儿子 (代上 6:20)
2) 革顺人, 示每的儿子 (代上 6:42)
3) 希西家时代人物; 约亚的父亲或先祖 (代下 29:12)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.29.12;
father of: Joah (H3098K)
§ Zimmah = "plotter"
1) a Gershonite Levite, son of Jahath
2) another Gershonite, son of Shimei; perhaps the same as 1 above
3) father or ancestor of Joah, a Gershonite in the reign of Hezekiah
